Class DBConnection.Error

java.lang.Object
  database.DBConnection.Error
Enclosing class:
DBConnection
public class DBConnection.Error
extends java.lang.Object

This Sub-Class handels the Errors which ocur during the SQL-Interactions

Constructor Summary
DBConnection.Error()
           
 
Method Summary
 boolean isErr()
          This method return, if there is an Error or Not
 void put2Clipboard(java.lang.String toClipboard)
          This method puts the value of 'toClipboard' to the Clipboard In case of an SQL-Error, the SQL-Statement will be placed in such a way and can be used in an external application.
 void setErr(boolean err)
          Here, an indicator for an error can be set
 void setErrNumber(java.lang.Integer newErrNumber)
          Here a Error-Numer (for SQL) can be set
